text: Daddy Duck is a 1948 animated short film featuring Donald Duck. It was released by Walt Disney Productions. ==Voice cast== *Clarence Nash as Donald Duck *Bea Benaderet as Adoption Bureau ==Home media== The short was released on December 11, 2007 on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume Three: 1947-1950. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Daddy Duck
